segments.text: Looking at the boy, I canâ€™t help but feel a sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He is precariously perched on a tilted stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he stretches upward makes my heart race; he could fall any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable but foolish at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry for the girl standing below him, hoping for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so eager and innocent, completely unaware of the risk involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout for them to stop, to be aware of their surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR
